page.title: 04EVENTS IN CHAGFORD
page.content: Throughout the year there are various events held in and around Chagford. Summer time is the most popular for these and each Whitsun there is the{ {Two Hills Race}in which runners race up and down{Meldon}and{Nattadon Hills. In June Chagford Lions hold their{ {Dartmoor Walk,}which covers some 15 miles of the most beautiful part of the Moor. In July the Primary School holds its{Summer Fayre and {Ram Roast.}Some time in August each year there is the{Chagford Show,}held in fields next to{Rushford Bridge. } Farm animals are exhibited and judged and there is also a gymkhana. In September the{Carnival}is held when many floats and walkers parade through the streets collecting for charities. Chagford Lions arrange a{Bonfire Night celebration and{Mid Devon Hunt}have a{ {Boxing Day Meet}in the Square.
